scripts.dev: npm run clean:logs && npm run kill && npm run dev:start
scripts.dev:start: NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO_MODE=true DEBUG=genkit*,ai*,google* GENKIT_LOG_LEVEL=debug next dev -p 9002 2>&1 | tee -a logs/nextjs-dev.log
scripts.dev:debug: npm run clean:logs && NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 9002
scripts.dev:verbose: npm run clean:logs && NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO_MODE=true NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_FIREBASE_EMULATOR=false DEBUG='*' next dev -p 9002 2>&1 | tee -a logs/nextjs-verbose.log
scripts.dev:with-emulators: npm run clean:logs && export PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk/bin:$PATH" && npm run emulators:background && sleep 8 && DEBUG=genkit*,ai*,google* GENKIT_LOG_LEVEL=debug next dev -p 9002 2>&1 | tee -a logs/nextjs-dev.log
scripts.emulators:background: export PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk/bin:$PATH" && nohup firebase emulators:start > logs/firebase-emulators.log 2>&1 & echo 'Firebase emulators starting in background...'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run lint:unused
scripts.logs:errors: grep ERROR logs/nextjs-dev.log || echo 'No errors found'
scripts.kill: pkill -f 'next-server' || true; pkill -f 'genkit' || true; pkill -f 'firebase-tools' || true; pkill -f 'java.*firestore' || true; lsof -ti:9002,4000,9099,8080,5001,5002,4400,4500,9150 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; echo '‚úÖ All servers and emulators killed'
scripts.status: curl -s http://localhost:9099 > /dev/null && echo 'üî• Auth Emulator: ‚úÖ Running' || echo 'üî• Auth Emulator: ‚ùå Not Running'; curl -s http://localhost:8080 > /dev/null && echo 'üî• Firestore Emulator: ‚úÖ Running' || echo 'üî• Firestore Emulator: ‚ùå Not Running'; curl -s http://localhost:4000 > /dev/null && echo 'üî• Emulator UI: ‚úÖ Running' || echo 'üî• Emulator UI: ‚ùå Not Running'; curl -s http://localhost:9002 > /dev/null && echo '‚ö° Next.js Dev: ‚úÖ Running' || echo '‚ö° Next.js Dev: ‚ùå Not Running'
